I think I can suggest a couple of movies that might fit the vibe you're looking for!

If you enjoyed the whimsical and fun tone of "Emma", I'd recommend checking out "Madagascar" (2005). This animated adventure follows a group of zoo animals on an exciting journey to the jungles of Madagascar, with lovable characters like Alex the lion and Marty the zebra. It's a lighthearted and entertaining film that's perfect for all ages!

Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something more family-friendly with a dash of humor, "Looney Tunes: Back in Action" (2003) could be a great choice. This live-action/animated hybrid stars Brendan Fraser as a spy who teams up with cartoon legends like Bugs Bunny and Daffy Duck to find a missing father and the legendary Blue Monkey diamond. It's a fun ride that's sure to put a smile on your face!

Or, if you're looking for a more lighthearted option, "The Polar Express" (2004) is a charming animated classic about the magic of childhood and friendship. Tom Hanks voices multiple characters in this film, which is sure to bring a smile to your face!
